title: Shanghai Disney Plans Unveiled: Big on ‘Pirates,’ but No Space Mountain
text: BING NEWS: Shanghai Disney Plans Unveiled: Big on ‘Pirates,’ but No Space Mountain SHANGHAI — The Walt Disney Company unveiled on Wednesday the designs and attractions at the new megaresort that is expected to open here in Shanghai in the spring, its first theme park in mainland China.
